key.name: show-notifications
key.description: If set to TRUE then notifications and messages will be used.

key.name: global-display-correction
key.summary: Whether the display should be globally corrected or left to applications
key.description: If set to TRUE then the video LUT is set with the display profile

key.name: set-icc-profile-atom
key.description: If set to TRUE then the __ICC_PROFILE hint will be set, which applications use to convert true color to screen color.

key.name: calibration-length
key.description: The length of calibration, as this is proportional to the accuracy. The option 'short' creates a quick profile, 'normal' a regular one, and 'long' takes a really long time, but is more precise and creates a better profile. Use 'ask' if you want the user to choose.

key.name: recalibrate-display-threshold
key.summary: The duration between sending notifications to recalibrate a display
key.description: This is the number of seconds in between notifying the user to recalibrate each display device. Set to 0 to disable the notification.

key.name: recalibrate-printer-threshold
key.summary: The duration between sending notifications to recalibrate a printer
key.description: This is the number of seconds in between notifying the user to recalibrate each printer device. Set to 0 to disable the notification.
